Articles.Content: I just completed my first orbit mission in a new 1.0 career mode. After landing, I sent jeb out on EVA for extra science, but the end result was inevitable: he glitched out, phased into the ground, and the game crashed. Luckily, I was smart enough to quicksave before EVA (it happened before), but anyone know how to minimize the kraken threat?
The only thing I can think of to minimise this is to make sure that the hatch is totally un obstructed. But when the kraken is hungry, it will feast regardless...
Can you please see the support stickies and provide your game logs the next time this issue occurs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
After I reloaded, Jebediah was able to exit the pod as normal, so this was just an isolated case.
